attributes.action: Deal or no deal should be the the only options a if a 2nd referendum is called
attributes.additional_details: We have been lied to by politicians who have backtracked on their manifestos that they were voted in on. The house is 60% remain and as such are trying to stop Brexit using every trick in their books and making up new rules as they go along. Anything to stop Brexit from happening. By only allowing the options to accept a deal whether it be Mrs May's deal or any other deal they can get a majority for or no deal can the house honour the referendum result of 2016.
attributes.background: The people have had their say in the first referendum. 17.4 M people voted to leave the EU. If parliament go for another referendum/Confirmatory peoples vote, remain should not be an option as this question has already been put to the people and lost. Deal or no deal only.
